faculty.name: Dr. Sanjay Parab
faculty.title: Vice Principal and Associate Professor
faculty.bio: Dr. Sanjay Parab, Vice Principal and Associate Professor, holds multiple qualifications including M.Com., M.A., M.Phil., Ph.D., LL.M., and FCS, with over 21 years of teaching experience. He has a keen research interest in Corporate Governance, Business Administration, and Corporate Finance, and was a university topper in Company Law during his LLB.
achievements: M.Com., M.A., M.Phil., Ph.D., LL.M., FCS
faculty.quote: Excellence in corporate governance and finance education drives sustainable business growth.
